definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: One of those was my friend, Soichiro Honda.
sentences.chinese: 他就是我的朋友之一，本田宗一郎。

sentences.english: Another Honda factory in Guangzhou produces Jazz sedans for export.
sentences.chinese: 另一个在广州的本田厂用来生产出口的爵士轿车。

sentences.english: Now Honda has been a target again.
sentences.chinese: 现在本田再一次成为众矢之的。

sentences.english: Then this woman and her friend drove away in a Honda CRV.
sentences.chinese: 随后，该女子和同伴驾驶一辆本田CRV离开。

sentences.english: Takayuki Fujii, a spokesman for Honda, said he could not confirm details of the agreement.
sentences.chinese: 本田的发言人藤井隆行表示，他不能证实协议的细节。

sentences.english: Back up in that space next to the blue Honda.
sentences.chinese: 请倒车停在那辆兰色本田车旁边的位置。

sentences.english: Honda has settled the strikes at its other two factories as well.
sentences.chinese: 本田旗下另两起罢工，均以厂方息事宁人告终。

sentences.english: Honda sets all-time monthly record for production in China.
sentences.chinese: 本田在华产量创空前月度记录。

sentences.english: I had a terrifying journey on the pillion seat of a Honda 750.
sentences.chinese: 我坐在本田750摩托车后座上有一次吓人的旅程。

sentences.english: It said Omron supplies electronic parts to Honda and Toyota.
sentences.chinese: 报导说，欧姆龙为本田和丰田供应电子元件。

sentences.english: Honda scored just six points all year courtesy of team-mate Jenson Button.
sentences.chinese: 本田全年只积了6分，还都归功他的队友花顿。

sentences.english: A 1999 Honda Accord is proving difficult to start.
sentences.chinese: 一辆1999年本田雅阁启动出了问题。

sentences.english: In Japan, Honda has begun the first commercial production of a hydrogen fuel-cell car, the FCX Clarity. Todd Mittleman of American Honda explains how it works.
sentences.chinese: 日本本田汽车公司已经推出了第一辆氢燃料箱电池车。

sentences.english: Both Honda "earth cars" were still very very slow indeed, even slower than Super Aguri.
sentences.chinese: 两台超级亚九里比两台本田“地球车”跑得都要快。

sentences.english: Such precise control is only possible with the Honda Multimatic.
sentences.chinese: 如此精确的控制是唯一可能与本田动力混合器。

sentences.english: Soichiro Honda and Takeo Fujisawo, the truth was we were great friends.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，本田宗一郎和我是最要好的朋友。

definition: Toyota or Toyoda (name)/Toyota, Japanese car make
Mazda, Japanese car make (derived from name Matsuda 松田)/also known as 萬事得|万事得
Nissan, Japanese car make/also transliterated 尼桑
Škoda, Czech Republic car manufacturer, a subsidiary of Volkswagen Group
